articles.author: Gear Team
articles.title: The 10 Coolest Things We've Seen So Far at CES 2025 - WIRED
articles.description: Tech's big show isn't fully underway yet, but the odd and wonderful gadgets are already here. These are the coolest things we saw at the event preview.
articles.content: Got an Apple Watch? If you download Doublepoints new WowMouse app, you can use finger gestures to control the cursor on your MacBook. Sit on the bed and hit Next Episode on your Mac screen without ev… [+1356 chars]
